DOC.brief_summary: This study ass safety investigational drug child 4 11 year age asthma . The subject attend 7 clinic visit , 3 morning , lung function test perform .
DOC.brief_title: A 12-Week Study To Assess The Safety Of Fluticasone Propionate/Salmeterol 100/50 Hydrofluoroalkane ( HFA ) Versus Fluticasone Propionate 100 HFA In Children With Asthma
DOC.mesh_term: Fluticasone Propionate , Salmeterol Xinafoate Drug Combination
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Must asthma . Must currently take inhale corticosteroid . Must able attend 7 clinic visit , 3 morning , lung function test least 60 % normal ( AM FEV1 PEF ) . Have historical current FEV1 PEF reversibility > =12 % . Exclusion criterion : Has ever lifethreatening asthma ( example respiratory arrest , mechanical ventilation ) . Has current ear respiratory tract infection . Has ever major illness ( cystic fibrosis , heart problem , tuberculosis ) .
